actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-898.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.
Motion to recommit to the Committee on House Administration with instructions rejected in House, roll call #136 (182-198).
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #137 (204-175).

official_title: A resolution providing for funds for the Select Committee on Assassinations.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-898) Directs the payment of expenses, not to exceed $2,500,000, for investigations and studies to be conducted by the House Select Committee on Assassinations.

titles.title: A resolution providing for funds for the Select Committee on Assassinations.
